outline: The 'G' (Ground) Phase: Integrating the 12 Profiles into the client's professional and personal identity.

The Role of the Nodes: Coaching the transition from South Node (past/talents) to North Node (future/growth).
Practical application: Aligning daily career tasks with the specific lines of the client's Sun/Earth gates.
Grounding the 'Big Picture' into actionable, high-frequency habits.

lessons.title: Professional Ethics, Boundaries & Scope of Practice
outline: The Ethics of 'Reading': Professional standards for analyzing charts of third parties (partners, children, etc.).
Scope of Practice: Clearly defining the line between Human Design coaching and clinical psychotherapy.
Handling 'Crisis Gates' and sensitive chart configurations with trauma-informed communication.
Informed consent and data privacy in the digital Human Design consulting space.
Mitigating 'Chart Dogma': Ensuring the client remains the ultimate authority in their own experiment.

lessons.title: The D.E.S.I.G.N. Framework™ Case Study Excellence
outline: The 'N' (Navigate) Phase: Documenting the long-term experiment and measuring client alignment through 'Signature' markers.
Case Study Architecture: How to present a client transformation using the 6-step D.E.S.I.G.N. methodology.
Troubleshooting the 'Stuck' Client: Identifying where the framework application is breaking down (e.g., Mind as Inner Authority).
Quantitative vs. Qualitative success markers in Human Design professional practice.
Peer review standards: Evaluating chart interpretations for accuracy, empathy, and actionable advice.

lessons.title: Final Comprehensive Review & Exam Preparation
outline: Systematic review of all L1-L4 technical mechanics (Type, Authority, Centers, Circuits, Gates, Lines).

Integrating the D.E.S.I.G.N. Framework™ as a seamless coaching flow.

Building your Professional Identity: Specializing in niches (Business HD, Parenting HD, Relationship HD).

Business Integration: Incorporating Human Design into existing coaching, HR, or wellness businesses.
